Coming from Samsung Galaxy S II, I was looking for a worthy upgrade. The GS II lasted 3yrs and had no issues with it. I loved the Quad HD screen & innovation like VOOC charging technology. Even though 5.5inches seemed big in hands, but after using this phone for more than 5 months now and 2 software upgrades, I have not noticed any issues as such.
  

  I needed an extremely fast camera, which the Sony camera sensor satisfies completely. 4K recording is something that will be a norm very soon. We are already seeing 4K tv's available. The specs are impressive
  

  1] Quad HD screen 2] 4K recording 3] 4G 4] Ultra fast charging.
  

  These specs are easily gonna stay for the next 3-4yrs no doubt. Anyone disagree?
  

  Thanks,
  

  Lingaraj Dharwad

column6: Why you should buy this BEAST!
column7:
This REVIEW solely based on my experience!
  

  Let me start this review by stating that Oppo is one of the few brands which provide warranty to their devices even after you ROOT it or install custom ROMs, your warranty doesn't void.
  

  Moving on to the OS of this device, it runs on out of the box Android JellyBean 4.3 WHICH is up-gradable to KitKat 4.4.2 Till today. There're also custom ROMs running Android Lollipop 5.0.1+ and will continue to get Latest android versions till >5 years. As its a flagship device, It'll get official builds of popular custom ROMs like CyanogenMOD/MIUI.
  

  When it comes to hardware, this baby is made of Ti-Al Body frame. I've myself dropped the phone a dozen times on road concrete and not even a single dent or scratch has appeared (Watch the Oppo R5 toughness video published by the company itself, they both have the same build material). The stereo speakers are very crisp and loud, even beats the HTC M8 in loudness comparison(Bass). The carbon-fiber back and skyline notification easily catches one's attention.
  

  Now coming to the price. I find this phone worth every rupee spent on it ( Especially because it doesn't void my warranty on installing ROMs and ROOTING). You won't regret buying it!
 
 

   READ MORE

its an AWESOME phone, camera is exelent, picture quality is much better then other smart phones of this range,processing is very fast and touch screen is top class...if you wanna buy a phone of this range just go for it...
 
 

   READ MORE

such a nice device to have everything is great and i m using apple six plus 128gb and this i don't fell noting issue about the battery back up and other mobile manufactures should learn to give this built quality specially Samsung.everything so nice specially the guster they given is pretty handy and no unwanted gimmes like samsung looking forward future oppo device

When was the first time you heard a phone with Full HD i.e 1080p display. If you are still wondering, OPPO was the first phone to come with 1080p display and now with Find 7 , Oppo has become the first company to give you a phone with 4*720p i.e Quad HD display.
  

  Looks: If you got a One plus One people will find it hard to differentiate between the two phones. But still this is a strongly built poly-carbonate phone with the screen occupying the whole of front instead of plastic. The phone will be a lot bigger of course as it has a 5.5 inch display and will surely take more than one hand to operate.
  

  Power: The phone runs on a new not newest Qualcomm Snapdragon 801 processor that gives you a clock speed of 2.5 Ghz. The speed is fantastic and coupled with 330 GPU playing games will be butter smooth. the 3 GB RAM helps to run multiple applications without any lag.
  

  Camera. No it is not 50 Megapixels. It has a wonderful 13 MPx camera that has an Ultra HDR option that wil help you combine multiple pictures which will give you a resolution equal to a lens that takes 50Mpx images.
  

  Price: If you compare this to other vendors in the market, this is the cheapest QHD phone available in the world. At nearly 38000 bucks this is not cheap at all, but neither is LG G3 and Korean specific Samsung LTE.
  

  Wrap up- Except the software point of view, the phone is a killer. The phone runs on android 4.3 colour OS of Oppo that has got some wonderful gestures . If you want to look different and feel different go for this phone, if QHD is not a big deal there is still OPPO 7a for you minus the QHD.
 
 

   READ MORE

column6: Honest in Depth Review by a actual user and mobile geek
column7:
So guys lets talk about OPPO 7 with QHD/2K screen .
  

  Rating: 8.5/10
  

  so we start with the
  

  Introduction
  

  Oppo is relatively unknown brand in India, However, it cannot be considered as a mere pushover by any means. Its here to stay and stay for good and would give stiff competition to brands such as HTC , Sony and Samsung etc etc.
  

  Points based review:
  

  * Gorgeous 5.5 " QHD screen with 1440 x 2560px IPS touchscreen and a staggering 534 ppi.
  

  1.It feels great to see and given the real estate it carries it produces stunning colours with high PPI of 534
  
  2. Viewing angles are great and screen can be used wearing gloves .
  
  3. It has a good contrast ratio and is very much comparable to that of one on HTC M8 and others in competition .
  

  4. SunLight legibility is unfortunately only few of the thing that disappoint me in otherwise a fantastic gadget. Screen is very reflective and quite a Finger Print magnet, Screen in sunlight gets difficult to look upon it can be due to the screen protector which company PRE Installs on this device .
  

  5. Gorrila glass 3 is quite good and relieves you with hassle of getting screen protector and it does it works pretty well
  



  * Quad Core 2.5 GHz Krait 400 CPU with the beast of a processor at heart i.e Snapdragon 801 SoC with 3G RAM to keep you engaged with cool multi tasking .
  

  1. This is guys a beast of performance device on AnTuTu it returned with a cool tally of points i.e 43,740 which beats LG G3, HTC M8 and S5 . Man phewww its really did work fine and was pretty lag free with all the multi tasking ON thanks to 3GB RAM on board.
  

  2. Browsing too leaves you a great impression of the gadget and its a great advantage on super or uber cool QHD Screen.
  



  *Android 4.3 operating System with COLOR OS 2
  

  1.Its pretty heavily customised UI but offer good options and have some useful features and less of bloatware.
  

  2. The best part is that you have number of themes to play with including pure jelly bean theme as well .
  

  3. There is exclusive space for Music widget and Camera widget with cool diary function.
  

  4. Lock screen is highly customisable as well with different theme and widgets .
  
  5. Notification area too gives you full icons and controls on the same window which is good as you need not run into settings every other minute.
  

  * 2K recording with 30frames per second and HDR 1080p recording.
  

  1. Recording was pretty good with zoom in facility and did a fantastic job ...sure you won't be         disappointed .
  

  *13 MP camera with Auto Focus and dual LED flash with cool zoom pictures capable of capturing 50MP samples.
  
  Oh yeah !! its was super cool in this field and did produce better pictures compared to few other highly praised flagships. 50 MP stitching is pretty cool and is quite useful . pixels doesn't break on zooming in.
  


  * 3000 MAh battery along with some other features such as NFC , USB OTG , Active Noise cancelation .
  

  1. Gives you good 16 hours of battery backup with heavy or moderate use with Wi-Fi on and brightness set to 75% . Played quite a few games around 40 Minutes and music for half an hour .
  

  **** Greatest and the best innovation is its ultra fast charging charger with blue chip...half an hour on power and bang your phone is fully charged ( well almost) to be used . super useful features given our lifestyle and amount many stay outside . feature I loved most .!!!
  

  * 32 GB of Onboard storage with expandable memory till 128 GB via MSD slot.
  

  Keep everything on board with ample in built memory and to top it off you have a memory card slot expandable unto 128 Gb using Micro SD.
  

  * it has some cool features on screen when powered off such as gesture for music , camera and volume up& Down and gestures to make calls and messaging .
  

  * volume on speaker was pretty loud and crisp , also the voice call quality was pretty good rather I would say Darn good . Good job OPPO
  


  * Fantastic built quality with use of premium material and craftsmen ship shows on this device , its quite light and carries a slim waistline .
  

  * Call reception and network receptions are quite good and features like hotspot and NFC works pretty well and is comparable to major flagships and rather beats many of them.
  
  Continued:
  


  Few Notable dis advantages :
  

  1. Dim navigation buttons at bottom which can be really irritating .
  
  2. Sunlight legibility is below par.( However, viewing angles and clarity is something to boost off)
  
  3. battery life can be little demanding when all the features are on .
  

  thats about it couldn't find any other disadvantages with this .
  

  To be continued ,
 
 

   READ MORE

Hi all,
  

  I have been using this mobile from last 2 days. I did purchased it from local mobile store and it cost me 18500 including phone, flip cover, selfie stick and also a screen protector.
  
  Now about the mobile, Just one word its "SEXY". I have never thought of buying oppo but once i saw it i was in love. Its slim, light weight and easy to hold and operate with one hand. Although I am 6ft tall but i never loved the concept of 5.5", for those big mobiles you ave to use your both hands to operate it.
  
  Now Start some Pros and Cons
  
  Pros:
  
  1. The best looks within this segment, its killer
  
  2. The best camera, I have tested the camera with samsung galaxy s6 and yes i can easily say its not less than that. It can compete with most of the god camera phones available in the market. Pictures are crisp, sharp and beautiful, both back and front.
  
  3. Super smooth
  
  4. Not even a single lag, easily handled games like asphalt 8 and nova 3. Its beast for gaming you will just love every moment while playing games on this mobile.
  
  5. Fast charging....charges 100% in 1hr and 15 mins.
  
  6. Screen, although its just a HD screen but colour reproduction and viewing angles are excellent
  
  7. Corning gorilla glass 3 protection
  
  Cons:
  
  1. Battery only 2320 mah. If you are noraml user than it can last around 7-8 hrs easily using wifi, 3g, and some calls. For moderate to heavy user you need to carry a charger or extra power bank everytime.
  
  2. Hybrid Slot (you can use it as dual sim or one sim and one sd card).
  
  If you really want to buy that looks sexy and performs awesome, you can always consider this. Nothing better than this at this price range. Its awesome.
 
 

   READ MORE
